00028 #ifndef __Ray_H_
00029 #define __Ray_H_
00030 
00031 // Precompiler options
00032 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00033 
00034 #include "OgreVector3.h"
00035 #include "OgrePlaneBoundedVolume.h"
00036 
00037 namespace Ogre {
00038 
00046     class _OgreExport Ray
00047     {
00048     protected:
00049         Vector3 mOrigin;
00050         Vector3 mDirection;
00051     public:
00052         Ray():mOrigin(Vector3::ZERO), mDirection(Vector3::UNIT_Z) {}
00053         Ray(const Vector3& origin, const Vector3& direction)
00054             :mOrigin(origin), mDirection(direction) {}
00055 
00057         void setOrigin(const Vector3& origin) {mOrigin = origin;} 
00059         const Vector3& getOrigin(void) const {return mOrigin;} 
00060 
00062         void setDirection(const Vector3& dir) {mDirection = dir;} 
00064         const Vector3& getDirection(void) const {return mDirection;} 
00065 
00067         Vector3 getPoint(Real t) const { 
00068             return Vector3(mOrigin + (mDirection * t));
00069         }
00070         
00072         Vector3 operator*(Real t) const { 
00073             return getPoint(t);
00074         }
00075 
00082         std::pair<bool, Real> intersects(const Plane& p) const
00083         {
00084             return Math::intersects(*this, p);
00085         }
00092         std::pair<bool, Real> intersects(const PlaneBoundedVolume& p) const
00093         {
00094             return Math::intersects(*this, p.planes, p.outside == Plane::POSITIVE_SIDE);
00095         }
00102         std::pair<bool, Real> intersects(const Sphere& s) const
00103         {
00104             return Math::intersects(*this, s);
00105         }
00112         std::pair<bool, Real> intersects(const AxisAlignedBox& box) const
00113         {
00114             return Math::intersects(*this, box);
00115         }
00116 
00117     };
00121 }
00122 #endif
